user_input: I already pay for DocuSign, why do I need this?
expected_outcome: Acknowledge current tool and highlight cost savings of consolidation.

user_input: $12 a month is too expensive for my tiny agency.
expected_outcome: Validate budget concerns and pitch the 20% discount or trial.

user_input: Does this come with more Google Drive space?
expected_outcome: Confirm that Business Standard includes 2TB of secure storage.

user_input: I hate switching between tabs just to send a contract.
expected_outcome: Agitate the pain point of tab-switching and present the Docs side panel solution.

user_input: I need to ask my business partner before upgrading.
expected_outcome: Acknowledge the partnership and offer a 30-day free trial to test it out risk-free.

user_input: Is Google eSignature actually legally binding?
expected_outcome: Confirm compliance with industry standards (eIDAS) and audit trails.

user_input: I don't have time to learn a new tool right now.
expected_outcome: Highlight that it's natively integrated into the Docs interface they already use.
